import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import NavBar from '../components/NavBar'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { Wallet, BarChart3, ShieldCheck, Bell, PieChart, Calendar, Sparkles } from 'lucide-react'; const Home = () => { const { isAuthenticated, formatCurrency } = useAuth(); const location = useLocation(); const [logoutNotice, setLogoutNotice] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { if (location.state?.loggedOut) { setLogoutNotice('You have been logged out.'); // Clear the state so refreshing doesn't re-show window.history.replaceState({}, document.title, window.location.pathname); const timer = setTimeout(() => setLogoutNotice(''), 2500); return () => clearTimeout(timer); } }, [location.state]); return (

ExpenseEase

Track where your money goes, understand your habits, and hit your goals — with clarity.

)}
{/* What can you do with ExpenseEase? */}

What you can do

Everything you need to manage money day-to-day, all in one place.

Track expenses & income

Log every transaction in seconds and keep your records accurate.

Visualize your spending

Understand patterns by category and time to make smarter decisions.

Stay in control

Keep your data private and your budget on track with clear insights.

Category insights

See top categories by spend and where you can save more.

Monthly overview

Get a clean summary of income, expenses, and savings each month.

Simple & fast

Designed to be quick to use, so you actually stick to it.

{/* Why this app? */}

Why you need this

Most people don’t overspend because of big purchases — it’s the small, daily expenses that add up. ExpenseEase helps you become aware of your habits, set better priorities, and build momentum toward your goals.

Typical month
{formatCurrency(1240)}
Tracked expenses
Typical month
{formatCurrency(2100)}
Tracked income
Focus on savings
{formatCurrency(860)}
Better awareness → better results
{/* How it works */}

How it works

1. Add transactions

Record income and expenses with categories, dates, and payment methods.

2. See your dashboard

Totals, savings, and top categories update automatically.

3. Improve decisions

Use insights to adjust habits and reach goals faster.

{isAuthenticated ? 'Open Dashboard' : 'Get started free'}
); }; export default Home;
